Articles.Content:
Me: an hour ago: OMG .20 bs,bsdfdvfvdhgf!?

50 minutes ago: *Mashes Download button*

40 minutes ago: ...

30 minutes ago: This is taking forrreeeeeevarr.

20 minutes ago: WHY IS THERE NOTHING ON YOUTUBE!?

10 minutes ago: do the forums have pics or sumthin'?

Now: Posting.

10 minutes in the future: wait what?

Alright. If my calculations are correct, I should reach Laythe on the first try.

Of course in practice I probably will botch this good.
calculations Odin? you do calculations?

Only some.

Mostly making sure my launcher has enough dV to support the intended payload to the target orbit, or in this case making sure that there's enough fuel to bring Jeb back after planting a flag on Laythe.
oh, that is a simple look at the numbers tyoe of thing, i was expecting detailed calculations
Oh, so this is the new crazy place? Assuming we keep it close to reality, that is.

Welcome.........Wait why am I not playing .20?!

*Gone*

*poof*

Holy crap guys. Check the biggest number of users online ever.

...Well then...I think we've accomplished something.

Yes, I was watching.

Partly because of 0.20 dropping.

Wow... KSP updates and the forums just DIE. It's kinda eerie in here now...

*Crickets*

*echoes*
Nope... Download issues.

You want insanity? Think about this long enough and you might go insane trying to reach the end. The Big Bang Theory basically states that "everything" was created when some sort of mass exploded and expanded and then there was the universe and everything in it. But where did that first bit of mass that exploded come from? What created it? And now run with this thought and just keep trying to go back to a "Beginning" and you will never find one. I have to stop myself from pondering on that at times. But you can seriously never, ever, find a beginning. And how is it possible that everything has always been and there isn't even a "beginning" to be found because it always was. Ok, enough.

And that's my version of insanity. Always was and always will be. And this is where usually you say, "the end", but that can't be. Crazy!
I think it's great. Things are nice and peaceful in here while I wait for my ship to warp to a Jool transfer window.

I think it's great. Things are nice and peaceful in here while I wait for my ship to warp to a Jool transfer window.

Did somebody say peaceful?

*hand creeps towards the floodgate switch*

Did somebody say peaceful?

*hand creeps towards the floodgate switch*

You do realize that if you touch that you'll instantly perish due to lighting from my eyes right?

...I'm not touching it...*is mere millimeters away*

...I'm still not touching it...

(yes i am obnoxious)

...I'm not touching it...*is mere millimeters away*

...I'm still not touching it...

(yes i am obnoxious)

Are you one of my siblings? 'Cause they were pros at that game. Sometimes I hate being the youngest child...
Having fun in 0.20 alright.
FOR THE GLORY OF THE TERRAN EMPIRE!
Is the main website/download server still down?

warning the command to open the floodgates has been sent

The gates will open in ONE hour

to stop the process, you must send a list of all real integers to the president of the USA and get his signature.

Good luck and Godspeed

FOR THE GLORY OF THE TERRAN EMPIRE!

*image snip*

I will not wear the Terran Empire Starfleet uniform.

In public.

xD

Nice reference...

FOR THE GLORY OF THE TERRAN EMPIRE!

-Snip-

We came in the name of capitalism.

I will not wear the Terran Empire Starfleet uniform.

In public.

xD

Nice reference...

Pretty sure if you wore anything other than the Valhalla Space Agency uniform, you'd be tried for high treason.

Edit: Oh hoh, here it is...

This is my first flag placement in 0.20.

It is also the first time I've landed on Laythe with anything in any version.

And Jeb himself is the one that did it.

Edited May 23, 2013 by OdinYggd
Oh Odin, if only you knew a significant amount of backstory...
